subject: Attention  Beneficiary
body:
Attention  Beneficiary
                                      PAYMENT APPROVED ON YOUR BEHALF
Be informed that The Untied Nation and The International Committees
has approved THE AGO INVESTMENT BANK to transfer your APPROVED Fund
worth $5.5 MILLION TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT but the problem we are having
now is one Floyd M. Shealy told us that you are dead and he is the
next of Kim to clam the fund and he has present the documents together
with the new Bank account information for us  to transfer the $5.5
million to his bank account  ...PLEASE WE  WILL LIKE TO HEAR FROM YOU
IF YOU ARE STILL ALIVE TO ENABLE  US KNOW WHAT TO DO OK
PLEASE HERE IS THE BANK ACCOUNT HE PRESENT TO US TO TRANSFER THE FUND
BELOW,DO YOU KNOW ABOUT IT?
Bank of America
6901 Northwest Expressway
Oklahoma City, Oklahoma 73132
ABA: 026009593 (International)
ACCT. #:003042656833
ACCT: Name: FMS Investments Inc.
Signatory: Floyd M. Shealy
I will be glad to hear from you fast
Thanks
Mr Usman Bello
Operations Director AGO INVESTMENT BANK
Phone:Fax : 02-6109772
E-mail:- 
usmanbello10101@outlook.com

subject: Re:    Attention  Beneficiary
body:
Hello Mr. Usman Bello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I can assure you that I am very much alive and well. As for this Floyd M. Shealy, I have no idea who he is.

I'm curious about the fund you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? How was it approved and why was it assigned to me?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Anastacia
